type.description:
## Using Effective Tool

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/using_effective_tool)

Checks whether the entity is currently using the effective tool of the block they're mining.

Type ID: `origins:using_effective_tool`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__



---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:using_effective_tool"
}
```

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Using Effective Tool (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-04-04

Using Effective Tool

Entity Condition Type

Checks whether the entity is currently using the effective tool of the block they're mining.

Type ID: origins:using_effective_tool

!!! note

**This entity condition type will only work on players.**

Fields

None.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:using_effective_tool"
}
